item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: what a pretty drink, and it's undoubtedly delicious too. that cream on top is ridiculously appealing. :)

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: What a great way to hold onto summer! I'm sure if you made summery cocktails all winter long it would keep the colds and flus away! You have an awesome looking blog by the way.
item.content:encoded: What a great way to hold onto summer! I’m sure if you made summery cocktails all winter long it would keep the colds and flus away! You have an awesome looking blog by the way.

item.title: By: Belle
item.dc:creator: Belle
item.description: There's nothing like a colourful cocktail to make you feel like an underage drinker in a nite club again! Yum, I love Midori!
item.content:encoded: There’s nothing like a colourful cocktail to make you feel like an underage drinker in a nite club again! Yum, I love Midori!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: It looks beautifully summery. I love pineapple juice.
item.content:encoded: It looks beautifully summery. I love pineapple juice.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Yep there's a bit of time left to enjoy these although I am hoping for a bit more time! These look delicious, Splice ice creams were one of my favourite ice blocks as a child :)
item.content:encoded: Yep there’s a bit of time left to enjoy these although I am hoping for a bit more time! These look delicious, Splice ice creams were one of my favourite ice blocks as a child ðŸ™‚
